column3: Provides an overview of the literature, including classic articles and books, in business strategy andpolicy (strategic management). Brings the student up to date on schools of thought, research issues, and practical applications in strategic management.

Master's Candidate for Degree: Entrepreneurship, International Business and Technology Management
column3: Provides doctoral students with an understanding of strategic management and entrepreneurship theory, as applied to international business and technology management literatures. Additionally, students are exposed to research methods in the strategy and entrepreneurship arenas.
Requires consent of instructor under whose direction study is taken. Departmental form required.
